enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Review of methodological work under the UNFCCC and Protocol: The Secretariat introduced a report on this new agenda item, highlighting five priority topics related to: greenhouse gas inventories; emissions and removals by sinks; P&Ms; mitigation and adaptation technologies; and impacts, vulnerability and adaptation of climate change. The EU, NORWAY, SAUDI ARABIA and NEW ZEALAND supported consideration of the item beyond SBSTA-17.
INDIA highlighted a recent workshop enhancing developing country capacity.
The US cautioned against the Secretariat moving beyond its mandate in initiating work.
